title: The famous hystory of Herodotus Conteyning the discourse of dyuers countreys, the succession of theyr kyngs: the actes and exploytes atchieued by them: the lavves and customes of euery nation: with the true description and antiquitie of the same. Deuided into nine bookes, entituled vvith the names of the nine Muses.
author: Herodotus.
notes: "To the gentlemen readers" signed by the translator: B.R., i.e. Barnabe Rich?.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
